org.apache.accumulo.tserver.compaction

Class MajorCompactionRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.accumulo.tserver.compaction.MajorCompactionRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class MajorCompactionRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Information that can be used to determine how a tablet is to be major compacted, if needed.
Shall be called with KeyExtent, MajorCompactionReason, VolumeManager, AccumuloConfiguration.
